var types = Ext.data.Types; // allow shorthand type access
Ext.define('es.model.lcObjPLocalTableName', {
	extend: 'Ext.data.Model',

	proxy: {
		type: 'rest',
		//<es-section>
		url : '/api-#systemName/local-table-name/',
		//</es-section>
		reader: {
			type: 'json',
			root: 'data'
		}
	},

	fields: [
		//<es-section>
		<<<extjsModelFields>>>
		{ name: 'localFieldName', type: 'typeExtjs', defaultValue: null },
		>>>extjsModelFields<<<
		//</es-section>
	]
});
